data.name: Message.ConnectionCommandTarget.CloseError

data.value: "Are You There" can be executed on Telnet connections only.

data.value: "Send Break" can be executed to serial, Telnet, and SSH2 connections only.

data.value: The buffer size must be between 0 and 9999.

data.value: {0} is not suitable as a network address.

data.value: Failed to reach the destination host.

data.name: Message.SOCKS.UnsupportedAddress
data.value: The type of address is not supported.

data.value: Port-forwarding failure. Please check whether the host allows port-forwarding.

data.name: Message.SSHTerminalConnection.ReproduceErrorOnSSH1
data.value: The "Memory Passphrase until the Application Quits" option in the SSH tab of the option dialog must be set when you reproduce SSH1 connections.

data.name: Message.SSHTerminalConnection.ReproduceErrorOnSSH2
data.value: The "Memory Passphrase until the Application Quits" option in the SSH tab of the option dialog must be set when you reproduce closed SSH2 connections.

data.value: An error occurred while closing the connection.

data.name: Message.SSHTerminalconnection.BreakError
data.value: Failed to send break signal. Please check whether the SSH server supports break signals.

data.name: Message.SerialTerminalConnection.ReproduceError
data.value: Serial connections can not be reproduced.

data.value: The following error occurred when connecting to {0}. {1}
